#summary Details on object Item

 * Item is an object with 6 datafields :
  * *id_item* : _integer_ : id of the item
  * *id_country* : _integer_ : id of the country related to the item
  * *id_category* : *integer* : id of the category related to the item
  * *title* : _string_ : title of the item
  * *subtitle* : _string_ : subtitle of the item
  * *personal_reference* : _string_ : your personal reference for this item
  * *description* : _string_ : description of the item
